title: Lefant
description:
*T series and M500 series are not currently supported, coming soon

[Check Routine] 
Check your cleaning task anytime you want, with whole routine record and 
keep your space always clean
[Remote Control] 
Wherever you are, schedule your cleaning task with no worries, enjoy your fresh space when you get home
[Fast update] 
One-click firmware update for better experience
[Customer Service]
Built-in support functions help you solve any problems you may encounter. Purchase our products with no worries.We are sincerely grateful for your support
